sentence.Network_en: The government is leery of changing the current law.
sentence.Network_cn: 政府对是否修改现行法律存有疑虑。

sentence.Network_en: They were leery about investing in a company controlled by a single individual.
sentence.Network_cn: 把资金投向一个由一人独自操控的公司，他们不大放心。

sentence.Network_en: I would be leery of committing my company to employ hundreds of Indian workers, sight and skill unseen.
sentence.Network_cn: 在对几千名印度工人的技术情况事先还不了解时,我是不会随便让我的公司雇用他们的.

读经济学人积累的词汇[BBS北外星光站] ... public provision 公共提供 leery 机敏的,细心的；戒心 enclosure movement 圈地运动.
mogul中文 ... - music mogul 音乐界巨头; leery 狡猾的，机警的 mongrel 杂种的, 混血儿的.

list.abs: 珍珠毛足鲈（Trichogaster leeri）（乍看还以为是战船）和拟唇齿脂鲤（Paracheirodon innesi）猫熊兵鲶（Corydoras panda）和斯氏 …
前鳃与后鳃有显著差异者，如珍珠马甲（Trichogaster leeri）与银马甲（Trichogaster microlepis）。前后对鳃间型态无显著差异者， …
leerily 机敏地leeriness 猜疑leeringly 以斜眼看

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 17th cent.: from obsolete leer 'looking askance', from leer + -y

entry.tran: 猜疑的；警觉的；有戒心的
entry.def: If you are leery of something, you are cautious and suspicious about it and try to avoid it.

example.ex: Executives say they are leery of the proposed system...
example.tran: 行政人员们说他们对拟建中的系统心怀顾虑。

example.ex: They were leery about investing in a company controlled by a single individual.
example.tran: 把资金投向一个由一人独自操控的公司，他们不大放心。

entry.def: If someone looks or smiles at you in a leery way, they look or smile at you in an unpleasant way, usually because they are sexually interested in you.

means.word_mean: 1. openly distrustful and unwilling to confide

auth_sentence.content: So, I am very leery of directed government subsidy.
auth_sentence.res_content: So, I am very leery of directed government subsidy.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: So, I am very leery of directed government subsidy.

auth_sentence.content: He was leery of getting Piasecki going on the subject of accounting.
auth_sentence.res_content: He was leery of getting Piasecki going on the subject of accounting.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He was leery of getting Piasecki going on the subject of accounting.

auth_sentence.content: If a hawk...plows into a snowbank, he will be leery of snow.
auth_sentence.res_content: If a hawk...plows into a snowbank, he will be leery of snow.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: If a hawk...plows into a snowbank, he will be leery of snow.
